name: D R o P
description:
Drop was developed during the 2020 Zen Jam in Vevey. It's a slow-paced, atmospheric, relaxing musical puzzle game. The player hears a melody and has to recreate that tune by pressing buttons, triggering the right notes in the right order, the whole being presented as drops falling onto a body of water. Controls: computer mouse. Headphones advised.
